diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Perforated appendicitis with phlegmonous changes and small fluid collection
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis of perforated appendicitis was supported by findings from the CT scan, which showed a dilated, fluid-filled appendix with hyperemic walls, adjacent phlegmonous change, and evidence of an appendicolith at the appendiceal base, along with extraluminal air and a developing fluid collection.
